entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yarmouth Airport 09:14 AM AST Friday 24 February 2023

Visibility: 1.0 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.4°C
Wind: ESE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow or freezing drizzle. High minus 3 except plus 2 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle or a few flurries changing to snow this morning. Rain along the coast late this morning and early this afternoon. Blowing snow inland late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 then northwest 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this afternoon. High minus 3 except plus 2 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:08 AM AST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow inland early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast early this evening. Wind becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 07:08 AM AST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 07:08 AM AST Friday 24 February 2023
